title.rendered: Tangle + Textbook Buyback + Kids’ Cart + Bulk Orders

content.rendered:
Tangle Toys

Tangle Creations’s mission is to continue to invent and develop products, ideas, and services with global utility and solutions. Tangle Creations is, was, and always will be dedicated to Peace Through Creativity. The things are addictive… stop by today to try them out!

Textbook Buybacks

The new semester has started, but do you still have last semester’s books crowding your shelves? We can help!

Sell us your college textbooks and we will give you cash or store credit.

 

Melissa & Doug Kids’ Cart

FUN ON AISLE FIVE!
With sturdy metal construction and pivoting front wheels, this kid-size metal shopping cart toy is the perfect addition to your play grocery store. Melissa & Doug’s mini grocery wagon is easy to maneuver, fun to fill, and built to last for years of pretend play! The MSRP is $69.97, but it’s available at Gottwals Books for only $49.97.

Bulk School Orders

Many school districts have discovered the benefits of placing their orders (both large and small) with Gottwals Books. We have relationships with multiple distributors and warehouses, allowing us to offer the lowest prices of any other book vendor. With our price guarantee, we are even cheaper than buying online!
